perkid_ability_hatchet_feralrush_descrip: Gain {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_Hatchet_FeralRush_StaminaRegen.Stamina * {perkMultiplier}]} stamina for each successful hit with Feral Rush.

perkid_ability_hatchet_ragingtorrent_des: Every hit of Raging Torrent reduces all Hatchet cooldowns by {[GlobalAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Ability_Hatchet_RagingTorrent.CooldownTimer * -100 * {perkMultiplier}]}%.

perkid_ability_hammer_armorbreaker_descr: If Armor Breaker breaks a block, the next attack within {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_Hammer_ArmorBreaker_BlockBreak.BaseDuration]} seconds deals {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_Hammer_ArmorBreaker_BlockBreak.DMGStandard * 100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% additional damage.

perkid_ability_hammer_wreckingball_descr: Wrecking Ball penetrates {[GlobalAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Ability_Hammer_WreckingBall.ArmorPenetration * 100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% of the target's armor.
perkid_ability_hammer_shockwave_descript: Shockwave applies Rend, reducing target's damage absorption by {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_Hammer_Shockwave_Rend.ABSStandard * -100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% for {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_Hammer_Shockwave_Rend.BaseDuration]} seconds.
perkid_ability_hammer_clearout_descripti: Clear Out now knocks targets back an additional {[GlobalAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Ability_Hammer_ClearOut.Knockback * 100 * {perkMultiplier}]}%.
perkid_ability_hammer_pathofdestiny_desc: Heal for {[GlobalAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Ability_Hammer_PathOfDestiny.DmgPctToHealth * 100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% of the damage dealt from Path Of Destiny.

perkid_ability_spear_sweep_description: Sweep's Coup De Grace now applies Bleed for {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_Spear_SweepFinish_Bleed.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% of weapon damage for {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_Spear_SweepFinish_Bleed.BaseDuration]} seconds.

({[GlobalAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Ability_FireStaff_PillarOfFire.MaxTrackedHitCounts}]} hits max.)

perkid_ability_shield_shieldbash_descrip: Shield Bash knocks back targets an additional {[GlobalAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Ability_Shield_ShieldBash.Knockback * 100 * {perkMultiplier}]}%.
perkid_ability_shield_shieldrush_descrip: After hitting a target with Shield Rush, gain Fortify, increasing damage absorption on self by {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_Sword_ShieldRush_Fortify.ABSStandard * 100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% for {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_Sword_ShieldRush_Fortify.BaseDuration]} seconds.
perkid_ability_shield_finalstand_descrip: Movement Speed Increased by {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_Sword_FinalStand_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% for {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_Sword_FinalStand_Haste.BaseDuration]} seconds after triggering Defiant Stance.
perkid_ability_greataxe_charge_descripti: Using Charge on a target with full health reduces the cooldown by {[GlobalAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Ability_GreatAxe_Charge.CooldownTimer * -100 * {perkMultiplier}]}%.
perkid_ability_greataxe_reap_description: If target hit with Reap is below 50% health, they are Slowed, reducing movement speed by {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_GreatAxe_Reap_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% for {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_GreatAxe_Reap_Slow.BaseDuration]} seconds.
perkid_ability_greataxe_execute_descript: Gain {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_GreatAxe_Execute_Heal.HealthModifierPercent * 100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% of health back on kill with Execute.
perkid_ability_greataxe_whirlwind_descri: Whirlwind hits grant Fortify on self, increasing damage absorption by {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_GreatAxe_Whirlwind_Fortify.ABSStandard * 100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% for {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_GreatAxe_Whirlwind_Fortify.BaseDuration]} seconds. (10 stacks max.)
perkid_ability_greataxe_maelstrom_descri: Targets hit by Maelstrom's No Reprieve are Weakened, reducing their attack damage by {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_GreatAxe_Maelstrom_Weaken.DMGStandard * -100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% for {[StatusEffects.Status_Perk_GreatAxe_Maelstrom_Weaken.BaseDuration]} seconds.
perkid_ability_greataxe_gravitywell_desc: Gain {[GlobalAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Ability_GreatAxe_GravityWell.DmgPctToHealth * 100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% of your damage with Gravity Well back as Health, and cast another burst around you on successful hit.
perkid_ability_icegauntlet_unbrokenwinds: Gain 10% Mana after a full Wind Chill burst.
perkid_ability_icegauntlet_unendingthaw_: Frost effects remains on enemies for 2 seconds after exiting Ice Storm.
perkid_ability_icegauntlet_icedrefresh_d: Reduce all Ice cooldowns on a killing blow by {[GlobalAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Ability_IceGauntlet_IcedRefresh.CooldownTimer * -100 * {perkMultiplier}]}%.
perkid_ability_icegauntlet_deadlyfrost_d: Frigid Showers ability will cause damage to enemies with Frostbite.
perkid_ability_icegauntlet_pylonburst_de: Add a 1 meter radius damage AOE when Pylon Casts.
perkid_ability_icegauntlet_healingtomb_d: Gain 10% Health after exiting Entomb with full mana.
perkid_ability_voidgauntlet_voidblade_li: On successful Void Blade hit, heal self for {[GlobalAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Ability_VoidGauntlet_VoidBlade_Lifesteal.DmgPctToHealth * 100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% of the damage done.
perkid_ability_voidgauntlet_nullchamber_: On Punishing Chamber activation, grant Fortify to friendlies within a {[SpellDataTable_VoidGauntlet.VoidGauntlet_NullChamber_Fortify_AoE.Radius]}m radius, increasing their damage absorption by {[StatusEffects.VoidGauntlet_NullChamber_Fortify.ABSStandard * 100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% for {[StatusEffects.VoidGauntlet_NullChamber_Fortify.BaseDuration]}s.
perkid_ability_voidgauntlet_scream_disea: On successful hit, Petrifying Scream inflicts Disease, reducing the target's healing by {[StatusEffects.VoidGauntlet_Scream_Disease.HealMod * -100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% for {[StatusEffects.VoidGauntlet_Scream_Disease.BaseDuration]}s.
perkid_ability_voidgauntlet_decayingorb_: On hit, Decaying Orb reduces the duration of the target's buffs by {[GlobalAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Ability_VoidGauntlet_DecayingOrb_ReduceBuffs.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * -100 * {perkMultiplier}]}%.
perkid_ability_voidgauntlet_drainingteth: On successful hit, Draining Tether inflicts Slow, reducing the target's move speed by {[StatusEffects.VoidGauntlet_DrainingTether_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% for {[StatusEffects.VoidGauntlet_DrainingTether_Slow.BaseDuration]}s.
perkid_ability_voidgauntlet_essenceruptu: On killing blow of a target you've afflicted with Essence Rupture, gain Empower, increasing your damage by {[StatusEffects.VoidGauntlet_EssenceRupture_Empower.DMGCorruption * 100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% for {[StatusEffects.VoidGauntlet_EssenceRupture_Empower.BaseDuration]}s.
perkid_common_cdronhit_description: Reduces active cooldowns by {[GlobalAbilityTable.Global_Common_CDRonHit.CooldownTimer * -100 * {perkMultiplier}]}% after being hit 5 times. Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.
